if there was an option to rate this less than one star i would gladly choose it i placed an order for some pizzas to be delivered to my office and i clearly remember being informed on the phone that the estimated delivery time would be between 30 and 45 minutes it has now been two full hours since then and we are sitting here with no signs of our food this entire ordeal has left us extremely disappointed with the service provided by glass nickel pizza and we have firmly decided that we will not be placing any future orders from them

although its known as a strip joint it also functions as a steakhouse where the dancers keep their bottoms covered i was interested in trying it out but unfortunately they made us wait for more than 30 minutes even though we had a reservation as a result we missed out on both the peep show and the opportunity to taste their steaks

our experience with the service at this restaurant was truly horrible despite spending a full hour there we were never served our food and finally gave up and left this certainly didnt meet our expectations for a new thai dining option and i cannot suggest this place to anyone

ive observed a slight delay in the service at this place lately possibly due to the recent changes in management and chef despite that the food has always been of excellent quality when you go make sure you indulge in the mouthwatering macadamia nut chicken  its an absolute delight

the food has consistently been good at this place but ive noticed recently that the service has become slower with the new management and chef i strongly suggest trying the macadamia nut chicken  its delicious

their cupcakes are absolutely heavenly although it would be great if they were caloriefree with a price range of 325 dollars and above for one cupcake it may seem expensive but i still give them 4 stars because many people are willing to pay the same or more for a cup of coffee so its a fair tradeoff for a special treat

in my opinion this is the only chinese restaurant available in the neighborhood if youre interested you can take the subway and visit chinatown but please note that it is pricey and does not offer anything extraordinary

in case you inquire the nice shop is willing to accommodate requests for price adjustments nevertheless the degree of flexibility will vary based on your desired bike model while the overall appearance of the shop may not measure up to that of az hd or hacienda the advantage of lower operating expenses could lead to financial benefits

returning to this place is out of the question due to their horrendous customer assistance its astonishing how they managed to mess up my pizza order to the extent that they refused to replace it and delivered a pizza with incorrect toppings even though their delivery service is frequently delayed and their schedule is inconsistent some might argue that under certain circumstances or while under the influence this place could be considered adequate
i thoroughly enjoyed all aspects of this establishment particularly the freshlycut french fries which were absolutely worth the journey

the rudeness displayed by the three waiters assigned to our table was disheartening furthermore the calamari failed to impress the chili was inadequately cooked and though the mussels and wings were passable this disappointing experience left me immensely unsatisfied
it seems that the waiters service was absolutely horrendous giving rise to speculations regarding their possible involvement in a union
i had my debut experience at oreganos the pizza was alright but not exceptional perhaps i should explore an alternative option during my subsequent visit

this is by far the worst chinese cuisine i have ever experienced in my lifetime the wonton soup lacks any flavor the meat is undercooked and the dumplings have an uncanny resemblance to playdoh  theres no chance of me returning here for another meal
the hostess provides a welcoming charm along with delectable cuisine the backyard features lush green grass that adds to the overall ambiance mannys ability to mimic voices is truly remarkable
i enjoyed every aspect of this location especially their freshly sliced french fries that are worth the journey

the customer service is even worse than expected as they made a mistake with my pizza order and failed to replace it with a new one including the wrong toppings despite the late delivery and inconsistent scheduling i suppose this place can be considered acceptable when in need or under the influence

in recent years downtown glendale has become more fun with events like the blues festival and chocolate glendale glitters among others despite the challenges presented by the recession the shops in the area have weathered it fairly well and there is a noticeable trend of recovery being a resident of glendale i am glad to be part of the community and anticipate many more years of enjoyable experiences in dtg

the management of this establishment known for their deceitful practices is filled with dishonest individuals they often manipulate customers into purchasing unnecessary maintenance plans resulting in a consistently high turnover of employees who are constantly being dispatched to sell various products and services it is strongly advised to steer clear from this place

unfortunately my 200th review is for this typical american irish bar  the music selection was decent but unsuitable for the atmosphere the service lacked attention and my booth seat was collapsing moreover the bathroom was utterly repulsive to top it off i paid 7 for a minuscule whiskey cranberry in conclusion i have no intention of returning

wow i can hardly believe it but my longings have genuinely manifested themselves right around the corner from where i live there happens to be a barbecue spot can you imagine if they offered an exceptional sixstar selection the taste and presentation of their food is simply astounding routinely as part of my fitness routine i find myself passing by this establishment either running or walking beware though if my selfdiscipline ever faltered astor house would conquer my finances completely make sure to visit and experience the wide range of mouthwatering barbecued delicacies along with their equally delightful accompaniments

it appears that the business has closed down as their phones have been disconnected and their website has been inaccessible for the past week despite being known for serving affordable americanized fast food chinese dishes i am disappointed and now in search of another local chinese restaurant that offers delivery services to arcadia
the level of efficiency in the service was moderately paced and the quality of the cuisine left something to be desired

oh my goodness my dreams have actually come to fruition theres a barbeque restaurant located conveniently close to my house is there possibly a sixstar rating available the quality of food is absolutely incredible every single day i go past this place on my runs or walks if i didnt exercise selfcontrol astor house might end up owning my entire bank account you should definitely check it out and try all the wonderful barbeque options as well as the delicious side dishes

cool little find average food but awesome servers and friendly environment draw you in i noticed nobody even needed a menu lol they were all greeted by name and asked if they wanted their usual family feel for sure

we stopped in for a bite 21214 after a visit to the hot springs in a word disgusting the table was sticky the windows were dirty there were stains on the walls it was gross this was a nice place with good truck stop style food i dont know what happened but well never go back
being a firsttimer at oreganos their pizza was adequate but not outstanding it made me consider sampling something else on my future outing there
i was disappointed by the rude behavior of all three waiters who attended to us as well as the poor quality of the calamari undercooked chili and only average tasting mussels and wings

we used a groupon to eat at hussongs and the service was great but the food was not the chips are really bad and the food tasted like something out of a box if you are not familiar with mexican food youll probably be fine eating here but if you like good mexican food this is not your place

theres no denying that tacos el gordo is the unrivaled spot in vegas for an exceptional and genuinely mexican dining experience at an affordable cost after savoring their tantalizing first round of tacos it wouldnt be surprising if you find yourself yearning for seconds this establishment effortlessly competes with anything ive ever tasted in socal the undisputed mecca for genuine mexican culinary delights

there was an abundance of inexpensive jeans that caught my attention but since i didnt have any intention of buying denim i didnt make a purchase however if i had wanted to i could have easily ended up with a new canadian tuxedo for a fairly affordable price denim dan provides discounted rates for men women and children ensuring that there is something for everyone

amazing customer service workers here actually care about helping you out i was looking for an uncommon triwing screwdriver here and maria i believe this is her name hunted down the someone who might know where to find it and got back to me promptly a would shop again

wow this barerrr convenience store is popping on friday nights  i just stopped by for a quick break on a bike ride so i didnt get to thoroughly assess this location   it has a really cool courtyard that is a great place to hang out in the evening  ill have to update my review when i get to see more

if there were a way to give zero stars i definitely would i called in an order for pizzas to be delivered to my office and was given an estimated delivery time of 3045 minutes its been a whopping two hours since then and were all still waiting for our meal the service provided by glass nickel pizza has been extremely disappointing and weve made up our minds to never place another order with them

the cupcakes they offer are absolutely amazing but it would be perfect if they had zero calories although the price of 325 dollars or more for just one cupcake may seem exorbitant i still rate them with 4 stars its worth considering that many individuals are willing to spend the same amount or even more on a single cup of coffee so it becomes an acceptable compromise for indulgence
just wanted a hot cup of green tea and watch the rain  nice little quite area away from the chaos of the mall  we got seats overlooking the strip

what are your thoughts on the level of service atmosphere food quality vegetarian options and general awesomeness at this location moreover do you find it to be a marvelous spot for a relaxed meal and also enjoy the fantastic offerings at their deli counter

despite the always excellent quality of the food i have noticed a slight delay in the service lately possibly due to the recent changes in management and chef if you visit make sure to try the mouthwatering macadamia nut chicken its an absolute delight
i have been to this location twice and the only consistent thing is rude staff who apparently are not trained in customer service skills the potato soup was ok
it appears that the quality of service from the server was extremely subpar raising questions about their possible membership in a union

there were an abundance of inexpensive jeans on display but i refrained from making a purchase since i didnt need any denim at the time however if i had wanted to i could have easily walked away with a reasonably priced canadian tuxedo denim dan caters to everyone offering discounted prices for all genders and ages across various styles of jeans

what are your impressions on the service ambience food options suitable for vegetarians the amazing overall experience and if it is a fantastic location for a leisurely meal along with the incredible offerings at the deli counter

throughout the years the enjoyment factor in downtown glendale has increased with attractions like the blues festival and chocolate glendale glitters just to name a few despite the recession many of the local shops have managed to endure and now there is an encouraging resurgence happening as a glendale resident i am appreciative of the thriving culture in dtg and excitedly foresee numerous future years filled with delightful experiences
this show is bound to captivate kids with its greatness
being a firsttimer at oreganos i found their pizza to be satisfactory but not exceptional it made me contemplate trying something else on my next venture there

if only i could rate this less than one star i ordered pizzas for my workplace and during the phone call i was assured that the delivery time would be between 30 and 45 minutes but its been two full hours and were still here hungry and angry glass nickel pizza has failed to meet our expectations and we wont make the mistake of ordering from them again
the price of authentic malaysian cuisine is reasonable the food is delicious and it has the charm of a small familyowned business i appreciate knowing that my money could support a childs education
the food is excellent the hostess is delightful there is beautiful green grass in the backyard to enhance the ambiance and manny is exceptionally skilled at voice acting

i was highly disappointed by the discourteous behavior exhibited by all three waiters who attended to our table in addition to the unpleasant taste of the calamari the undercooked chili and the mediocre quality of the mussels and wings this entire experience left me feeling extremely dissatisfied

in a popular destination youll find pizza that is famously delicious and widely regarded as among the best coupled with regular promotions on quality beers
ill eat here in a pinch noting great nothing too horrible

i will not be coming back to this establishment because the customer support is even worse if thats possible they completely messed up my pizza order and didnt bother sending me a new one instead they delivered a pizza with the wrong toppings despite the delayed delivery and unreliable scheduling perhaps this place is acceptable in urgent situations or when intoxicated

i took my wife to sea saw for valentines day  there is absolutely no ambiance the food was mediocre and the prices was exorbitant  the service was however acceptablenall in all it was a very very disappointing experience

the waiters service was dreadful giving rise to suspicions of union ties

spurred by an influx of raving recommendations i was filled with curiosity and decided to explore the mystique surrounding this venue alas my experience ended up being a major disappointment as everything failed to live up to the hype the wing sauce was mostly oil and left an unsavory taste in my mouth it would be wise to bypass this eatery and preserve your finances

this establishment is a gem for finding incredibly fresh produce and fish with consistently great service the best day to go is wednesday when their sales transition from previous weeks to new weeks all on the same day giving patrons the advantage of both

the freshness and quality of produce and fish at this place are simply outstanding the service has never disappointed and remains topnotch for the ultimate shopping experience wednesday is the optimal day as it marks both the culmination of the previous weeks sales and the commencement of the new weeks sales
